abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column notes that after Jay Rao discovered his mother Yasmeen Rabbani's dead body in her Woodhaven, Queens, home his days have been full of grim tasks and few answers.
snippet: After Jay Rao discovered his mother’s body last Sunday night, his week has been full of grim tasks and few answers.
lead_paragraph: After Jay Rao discovered his mother’s body last Sunday night, his week has been full of grim tasks and few answers.

headline.main: What a Family Faces After a Murder: The Terrible Mechanics of the First Week
headline.print_headline: What a Family Faces After a Murder: The Terrible Mechanics of the First Week
headline.seo: What a Family Faces After a Murder: The First Week
